title: Weird: Can't even open League?
body:
Hi! Today I tried opening League but nothing came up, so I clicked the icon on my dock and I got a white screen with an error message:

"Failed to load URL" (insert URL here) "with error "unsafe port" (-312)."

I had to force quit League of Legends to get this off my screen. Also, I tried putting the URL into Safari and I got a warning saying that the URL might be a 'phising' website? What?!?

How can I get my game to work again? Please help, SOS!

replies.body:
It sounds like something may be blocking League from reaching the servers properly. I strongly recommend working through our [**Mac Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#section-mac) to ensure your local network settings are properly configured for League.

Please let me know if this caused any noticeable change.

Thanks for the reply!

I forgot to update my post, but the problem went away once I restarted my computer. I believe I needed my computer to shut down and refresh. Thank you for your help anyway!
